root.name: Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2
root.description: HistoryCastlevania: Lords of Shadow 2 was indirectly revealed in tandem with the Nintendo 3DS title Lords of Shadow - Mirror of Fate in the June 2012 issue of Nintendo Power. Dave Cox, producer at Mercury Steam, was quoted saying that the events of Mirror of Fate would lead directly into Lords of Shadow 2 without the latter having been formally announced at that point. During Gamescom 2012, Cox also revealed the title would be heading to the PC.StoryThe main character will once again be Gabriel Belmont, who has thrown away his former name and become a powerful malevolent vampire, Dracul ('Dragon' in Romanian) the prince of darkness, eventually becoming feared by the people as "Dracula".Sometime after the events of Castlevania: Lords of Shadow - Mirror of Fate, Dracula is being hunted by his former comrades, the Brotherhood of Light. Also opposing him are his own descendants, the Belmont Clan (of whom a new member will debut), and his son, Alucard. The story will span centuries, including during modern times.GameplayDracula will be able to use vampire powers, a whip remnant of the Combat Cross, as well as a sword.There will be no chapters in Lords of Shadow 2, being replaced by a constant, seamless world.
